title: Performance Technology-based Instructional Designer Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and practical experience in science fields
context.additional_context: Developing Instructional Design Capabilities Incorporating Performance Analysis and Systems Thinking for Science Sector Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically develop instructional design strategies linked to performance improvement goals
Learners can design educational solutions by applying systemic causal analysis and team collaboration processes
Learners can propose instructional design improvements through data-driven performance evaluations of scientific problems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
